'''1.20.2 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.20.2-rc2''' in the launcher) is the second and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 18, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-release-candidate-2|Minecraft 1.20.2 Release Candidate 2|September 18, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a bug.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.2 Release Candidate 2|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed villagers and wandering traders suffocating when travelling up slopes in minecarts.</onlyinclude>
